text: Hi, thank you very much for dropping
by at Telstra's IMS on AWS demo.

And this demo is about how
Telstra optimized resiliency
of its existing IMS network

by deploying C-N-C-S a cloud
native communication suite from
Nokia on AWS.

So IMS is the sub component
of telecom networks
that powers voice, such as
whenever we use our cell phone

for making ordinary voice
calls or emergency calls.

And it's very important to
have resiliency of that network
through different type of events,
whether they are planned events such
as maintenance activities

or unplanned events such
as outages customers

or operators like Telstra
wanted to make sure
that there is no impact of these type
of activities on customer services.

So service continuity is
very important for Telstra
and other operators and this is
what they wanted to achieve in the demo.

So basically the objective
of the project was to study
and pilot how we can enhance resiliency

of nationwide networks
by deploying IMS on AWS.
And to do that the objective was
to accomplish seamless service continuity
for Telstra's consumers so that planned

and unplanned activities
don't interrupt availability
of services to their consumers.
One important goal that Telstra wanted
to achieve from this project was

to accelerate the deployment
such that it doesn't take
as much time as ordinary on-premises.

it was very important for Telstra
